name: printing
notes:
## Notes on 3D printing

Stacks for a printer:
- Boards
  - Mega Arduino w/ RAMPS
  - RAMBo mini (RepRap Arduino-compatible Mother Board)
  - [EINSY RAMBo](https://www.printedsolid.com/products/einsy-rambo-1-1)
- [Firmware](https://reprap.org/wiki/List_of_Firmware)
  - Marlin
  - RAMPS (?)


RAMBo boards are based on Arduino, most probably are
